roleset.name: to praise, glorify
roleset.note: LAUD-V NOTES: Frames file for 'laud' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from laud.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: all arguments
example.text: Mrs. Hills lauded South Korea for [*-1] creating an intellectual-property task force and special enforcement teams of police officers and prosecutors trained [*]to pursue movie and book pirates .
example.arg: for [*-1] creating an intellectual-property task force and special enforcement teams of police officers and prosecutors trained [*]to pursue movie and book pirates

example.name: transitive
example.text: When he was hired [*-1] [*T*-2], Mr. Payne lauded Mr. Decker 's `` extraordinary ... skills '' and his `` outstanding reputation as one of the West 's brightest bankers . ''
example.arg: Mr. Decker 's `` extraordinary ... skills '' and his `` outstanding reputation as one of the West 's brightest bankers . ''
